item.title: Logs - Scoopi Web Scraper - why just scrape when you can scoop
item.description: Logs Scoopi uses Log4j2 library for logging. By default, it logs info message to console and log errors to logs/error.log file. Debug and Trace logs The log configuration file log4j2.xml is located in conf folder. By default root log level is info which outputs error, warn and info logs. To output debug logs, change root level to debug and un-comment appender-ref ref=“debuglog” element. and similarly, for trace logs. The trace logs output query and parsed html nodes which is helpful to construct query strings.
